name: RIKO
description: RIKO is a meme coin symbolized by the fearless honey badger, dedicated to building a strong, engaged community in the cryptocurrency space. Launched on the Gra.fun platform, RIKO emphasizes accessibility and community involvement at its core. Rooted in meme culture, RIKO leverages the power of viral content and community-driven narratives to amplify its appeal and focuses on fostering a loyal user base, with the success of RIKO driven by the contributions and engagement of its vibrant community.
